description: Retrieves the repository policy for the specified repository.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository with the policy to retrieve.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The registry ID associated with the request.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The repository name associated with the request.

nested_items.name: policyText
nested_items.description: The JSON repository policy text associated with the repository.
